name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.postarticle: npm run feed && node bin/html.js --latest && node bin/html-validator.js --latest && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postbook: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.postlink: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.poststatus: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postsubscription: npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.test: stylelint static/css/ && eslint config.js bin/ static/js/
scripts.version: npm run feed && node bin/html.js --all && npm run img && npm run static && node bin/feed-validator.js && node bin/html-validator.js
